card.name: One Foe to Breed a War

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Orcs - 5 strikes with 8 prowess, Trolls - 2 strikes with 10 prowess

property.name: Special
property.value: Any man hazard creature can be played here.

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Men - each character faces 1 strike at 9 (detainment)

property.name: Special
property.value: You may tap a sage and a scout during the site phase to untap this site.

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Animals - 2 strikes with 10 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters)

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Elves - 4 strikes with 7 prowess; Dúnedain - 3 strikes with 10 prowess

property.name: Special
property.value: Any company moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by 2. A minion company may not attack another company at this site. A Ringwraith may not move to this site.

property.name: Special
property.value: The first minor item played at this site each turn does not tap the site. Contains a hoard.

property.name: Adjacent
property.value: Glittering Caves (0), The Pûkel-deeps (9), The Under-gates (6)

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Undead (1st attack) - 3 strikes with 9 prowess; (2nd attack) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to a Shadow-hold

property.name: Special
property.value: Any Undead creature or Pûkel-creature may be played at this site.

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Elves - 3 strikes with 8 prowess; Elves - 2 strikes with 10 prowess

property.name: Special
property.value: Any company moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by 2. A minion company may not attack another company at this site. A Ringwraith may not move to this site.

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Undead - 1 strike with 8 prowess; each character wounded must make a corruption check modified by -2

property.name: Special
property.value: An overt company must tap an untapped character (if available) if this site is revealed as its new site

property.name: Adjacent
property.value: Carn Dûm (0), The Under-leas (5), The Under-vaults (6)

property.name: Special
property.value: An overt company must tap an untapped character (if available) if this site is revealed as its new site.

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Balrog (1st attack) - 2 strikes with 16 prowess; (2nd attack) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to a Ruins and Lairs

property.name: Special
property.value: Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment. If a manifestation of Balrog of Moria is in play or defeated, the first automatic-attack is canceled.

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Orcs (1st attack) - 4 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd attack) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to a Shadow-hold

property.name: Special
property.value: When a gold ring is tested in a company at this site, the result of the roll is modified by +1.
